author: ekoneil
msg: Reworking the downloads page for an eventual 1.0 release.

This change pushes each release onto its own page with an aggregating page being downloads.html.  This also includes the correct configuration files and some commented out links for the 1.0 release pages that will be tied into the ASF distribution mirroring infrastructure.
Test: build.site runs / site looks right
